title: Volume of solid of revolution about x-axis

content.question: A vase has the shape obtained by revolving the curve <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D8B@</annotation> </semantics> </math> from <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiEaiabg2da9iaaicdaaaa@38B1@</annotation> </semantics> </math> to <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>5</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiEaiabg2da9iaaicdaaaa@38B1@</annotation> </semantics> </math> about the x-axis, where x and y are measured in inches. What is the volume, in cubic inches, of the vase?

topic.text: 8.9: Volume with Disc Method - Revolving Around the x- or y-Axis

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
